resources.string:
My name is Ssara. 
I am a college student 
who loves to explore different aspects of life. 
I enjoy reading books of various genres, from fantasy to non-fiction. 
I also like to play games, both online and offline, 
that challenge my skills and creativity. 
Watching movies is another hobby of mine 
I am always curious to learn new things and expand my horizons. 
I believe that life is a journey full of surprises and opportunities.
